Donations: $115,000 in donations through Arlington Health and Human Services Charitable Corporation
Housing Corporation: and $100,000 through Housing Corporation of Arlington

Rental Relief Lottery: Round 1 of a rental relief lottery occurred on 4/13- $3 million/round 2 of the lottery in early June

Town Sources: $1.2 million from Town Sources plus Private Fundraising via the Brookline Community Foundation

City Disaster Relief Funds/Donations: $1.5 million is available to assist cost-burdened residents with rent or homeownership (excluding mortgage) costs.
